statements: SELECT * FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring;
SELECT device_name, device_type, performance_score FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring ORDER BY monitoring_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, usage_hours FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring WHERE device_type = 'ECG';
SELECT AVG(usage_hours) AS average_usage_hours, MAX(performance_score) AS max_performance_score FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring ORDER BY monitoring_timestamp DESC, usage_hours ASC, performance_score DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, performance_score FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring WHERE usage_hours > 100 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 0.8 AND 0.9 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, monitoring_timestamp FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring WHERE device_type = 'MRI' AND usage_hours < 50 ORDER BY monitoring_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, performance_score FROM MedicalDeviceMonitoring WHERE device_name LIKE 'ECG%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM MedicalDevices WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM MedicalDevices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLogs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM DeviceLogs GROUP BY device_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM MedicalDevices WHERE usage_hours > 1000 ORDER BY usage_hours DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer, last_maintenance_date FROM MedicalDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT d.device_name, l.log_timestamp, l.log_message FROM MedicalDevices d JOIN DeviceLogs l ON d.device_id = l.device_id WHERE l.log_timestamp > '2022-01-15' ORDER BY l.log_timestamp ASC;

SELECT d.device_id, d.device_name, d.manufacturer, COUNT(l.log_id) AS num_logs FROM MedicalDevices d LEFT JOIN DeviceLogs l ON d.device_id = l.device_id GROUP BY d.device_id HAVING num_logs > 5 ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices WHERE device_type = 'Pulse Oximeter';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM MedicalDevices WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM MedicalDevices ORDER BY device_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceUsage WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT device_name, issue_description, reported_date FROM MedicalDevices INNER JOIN DeviceIssues ON MedicalDevices.device_id = DeviceIssues.device_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM MedicalDevices WHERE device_type='ECG';
SELECT device_id, device_name, purchase_date FROM MedicalDevices WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DeviceUsage WHERE usage_hours > 100 ORDER BY usage_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT issue_id, device_id, issue_description FROM DeviceIssues WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY reported_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM DeviceData;
SELECT device_name, last_updated FROM DeviceData WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type FROM DeviceMaintenance WHERE technician_id = 101;
SELECT device_id, error_message FROM DeviceErrors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_performance, MAX(value) AS max_performance FROM DevicePerformance WHERE performance_metric = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM DeviceData ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT device_name, usage_hours FROM DeviceData WHERE usage_hours > 100 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, maintenance_type FROM DeviceData JOIN DeviceMaintenance ON DeviceData.device_id = DeviceMaintenance.device_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Check';
SELECT device_id, performance_metric, value FROM DevicePerformance WHERE value > 0.8 ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT DeviceData.device_name, DeviceErrors.error_message, DeviceErrors.timestamp FROM DeviceData JOIN DeviceErrors ON DeviceData.device_id = DeviceErrors.device_id ORDER BY DeviceErrors.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM MedicalDevices WHERE device_type = 'X-Ray Machine';
SELECT manufacturer, purchase_date FROM MedicalDevices ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT log_date, usage_hours FROM UsageLogs WHERE device_id = 12345 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT metric_date, temperature, pressure FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE device_id = 54321 AND pressure > 100 ORDER BY metric_date;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM MedicalDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT device_id, device_name, maintenance_type FROM DeviceMaintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT UsageLogs.log_date, UsageLogs.usage_hours, PerformanceMetrics.temperature FROM UsageLogs INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON UsageLogs.device_id = PerformanceMetrics.device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM IssueReports GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 3;
